attributes.action: Dispand CSA and compensate parents when CSA act illegally and are found guilty of Maladminastration.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Government to take action against the CSA and stop them ignoring the Law Parliament set out and act outside the Law so they can be paid a bonus. My case. CSA found Guilty by Parliamentary Health Ombudsman of 5 counts of Maladminastration. I lost home job and my children becasue of CSA actions and nothing is done about it. I recieve £5000.00 in damages. Government lose hundreds of thousands in taxes from me and also Government own debt from the banks which i banked with. My children are made worse off because of the CSA. The Government should have the balls to end this CSA hell for people once and for all. They are destroying peoples lives. CHILDRENS lives. Please sign petition and get a Government to listen and act beofre many more lives are ruined.

rejection.details: This is correspondence on a personal issue
